results.title: Brains Turned to Glass? Suffocated in Boathouses? Vesuvius Victims Get New Look
results.abstract: Two studies examined grim scenes left at a Roman settlement devastated by the 79 A.D. eruption.

media.caption: Researchers studied the ribs of 152 individuals recovered from the boathouses of Herculaneum, the ancient Roman city destroyed in the eruption of Mount Vesuvius that also buried Pompeii.
